definition: name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album
to lift/to raise/to raise one's head/high/high spirits/soaring/expensive
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"

sentences.english: The three-episode docudrama reconstructs the life of Leonardo from early childhood to death.
sentences.chinese: 三集纪录片重建生活的莱昂纳多从幼儿死亡。

sentences.english: “It will be strange to see Leonardo on the other side, ” he added.
sentences.chinese: “看到莱昂纳多在对面这会很奇怪，”他补充到。

sentences.english: Leo could be nominated for Shutter Island or Inception.
sentences.chinese: 莱昂纳多将会因为禁闭岛或者盗梦空间获得提名。

sentences.english: Leonardo used his hands liberally and frequently as part of his painting technique.
sentences.chinese: 莱昂纳多会经常用他的指纹作为他的特殊的绘画手法。

sentences.english: Who would go for Leonardo? Okay.
sentences.chinese: 谁会把票投给莱昂纳多，好。

sentences.english: Bad blow for Leonardo and Luca Antonini.
sentences.chinese: 莱昂纳多和卢卡安东尼尼遭受重大打击。

sentences.english: The pedestrian bridge opened in 2001 and crosses the E18 highway.
sentences.chinese: 莱昂纳多跨线桥2001年开通，横跨E18公路。

sentences.english: Adriano Galliani and coach Leonardo underlined the importance of the Milan qualification to the next round of the Champions League.
sentences.chinese: 加里亚尼和莱昂纳多强调了米兰获取出线权的重要性。

definition: Michel or Mitchell (name)/George Mitchell (1933-), US Democratic party politician and diplomat, influential in brokering Northern Ireland peace deal in 1990s, US Middle East special envoy from 2009
proletariat (loanword)/abbr. for 普羅列塔利亞|普罗列塔利亚[pu3 luo2 lie4 ta3 li4 ya4]
